android.name: Orange Peel FacePack
android.content:
Grind the dried Orange Peels till you get a powder. Mix a tablespoon of this powder with yogurt till you get a smooth paste. 
 Apply this paste to your face and keep it on for about 20 minutes. Rinse with Cold Water.

android.name: Yogurt & Lemon Facepack
android.content:
Mix the yogurt and lemon juice thoroughly.
Apply the paste on face and leave it for 20 minutes. Wash with Cold Water.

android.name: Milk & Saffron
android.content: Mix Milk and Saffron. Let Saffron stay for 3-4 hours.Wash your face, pat dry, apply this mix and keep it for 20 minutes. Wash with lukewarm water.
